name: Meet Someone New! (MSN)
description:
Content Warning: Stalking.

WARNING: Do not stream this game. Some mechanics will reveal real world information about you without warning. 

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Hop online and Meet Someone New! There's always someone who wants to be your friend... or maybe more? Hopefully they're not more than you bargained for.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Programmer: Trigonious (Brad)

Designer: Mattress (Matt)

Narrative Designer: Nico Ram

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Known Issue: Some mechanics will not function if you use a VPN or the adblocker "uBlockOrigin"
